ScopeHosts uses latest Hypervisors on Hybrid Technology enabled Hardwares and Servers. VPS Web Hosting can be controlled and monitored with User Friendly GUI Control Panel SolusVM. This hosting solution allows you to get full Dedicated Server advantages at a lesser expenses. The best hosting service to experience the ultimate power over the virtual server. Now relish the complete power of Virtual Private Server with customer-friendly platform.

NETHERLANDS KVM LINUX VPS HOSTING Kernel-based Virtual Machine(KVM) turns the Host Linux Kernel into Hypervisor. It Supports both Linux and Windows OS.

AWESOME FEATURES WITH NETHERLANDS KVM LINUX VPS HOSTING:
  • Our KVM VPS Hosting(VPS) offers Dedicated Resources
  • FREE OS Reloads
  • Real-Time Server Monitoring
  • Safe Isolated Environments
  • FREE Standard DDOS Protection
  • Instant VPS Setup
  • Anytime Moneyback
  • FREE 1-IPV4 | 5-IPV6 IP ADDRESSES
